医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
开创性研究将军人睾丸癌与“永远的化学物质”联系起来加里·弗洛克 (Gary Flook) 在空军服役了 37 年，曾在现已关闭的伊利诺伊州查努特空军基地和印第安纳州前格里森空军基地担任消防员，在那里他定期进行水成膜泡沫（AFFF）训练。白色阻燃剂非常有效，但现在已知有毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Pioneering-study-links-testular-cancer-among-military-personnel-to-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Pioneering-study-links-testular-cancer-among-military-personnel-to-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=964621c8-2d99-44c1-a6de-b576fa8084f3 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 07:17:00 -0400 Pioneering study links testicular cancer among military personnel to ‘forever chemicals’
工会推动限制医院首席执行官薪酬，被指责玩政治目标是雄心勃勃的：医院高管的收入不应超过美国总统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/As-a-union-pushes-to-cap-hospital-CEO-pay-ite28099s-accused-of-playing-politics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/As-a-union-pushes-to-cap-hospital-CEO-pay-ite28099s-accused-of-playing-politics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7003eb4c-cd37-47d9-af39-ed8517225d57 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 06:53:39 -0400 As a union pushes to cap hospital CEO pay, it’s accused of playing politics
炎症性肠病患者患结直肠癌的风险更高吗？研究人员分析了一大群炎症性肠病患者的数据，并研究了结直肠癌的风险和频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Are-炎症-肠病-患者-more-at-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/Are-炎症-肠病-病人-more-at-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43bed9b3-de6e-4855-a760-92227ec57b04 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 06:33:00 -0400 Are inflammatory bowel disease patients more at risk of colorectal cancer?

儿童时期与成年时期的多动症诊断：遗传结构是否存在差异？研究人员调查了童年时期和成年时期被诊断患有多动症的个体在独特和共享的遗传和功能结构方面是否存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/ADHD-diagnosis-in-childhood-vs-adulthood-is-there-a-difference-in-genic-architecture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/ADHD-diagnosis-in-childhood-vs-adulthood-is-there-a-difference-in-genic-architecture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=249aafe8-fed6-41d0-87f9-4c2a0fe71b07 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 06:15:00 -0400 ADHD diagnosis in childhood vs adulthood: is there a difference in genetic architecture?
